extendedInfo.description: Italy is a beautiful country with the best of cities, villages, countryside and shoreline. Wallpapers you will love!â· Save images as wallpaper â· Share with friends via Facebook, Twitter, SMS, email and moreâ· Contains 55 wallpapersAll images copyright their respective owners, including :Alaskan Dude, giopuo, Jim Linwood, gnuckx, David F. Bacon, tony Wasserman-- creative commons licensing.Tags: travel, photos, italy, wallpapers, theme, dream, dreamtree, scenery, landscape, venice, rome, florence, art, architectureIf you have any issue with my use of any of the images, please contact me and they will be removed. Thank you.  Legal notice: We believe our images fall under the fair use doctrine as they are reduced size and excerpted for informational purposes. However, if you would like to request removal of an image from our collection for copyright reasons, feel free to contact us at dreamtreemobile@gmail.com and we'll be happy to oblige.Note on Permissions:android.permission.INTERNET is used to connect to the advertising mediation servers and our partner advertising network servers for the purpose of retrieving advertisements. android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE is used to determine the existence and quality of a phone's network connection for retrieving advertisements. android.permission.GET_TASKS is used to prevent advertisements from being retrieved when an application is in the background by checking to see if the application's task is active when an advertisement is requested. This is a workaround for the lack of global notifications about the active state of Android applications.android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE is used for accounting and auditing purposes by advertising networks. Advertising networks use anonymous unique identifiers to limit the number of impressions and clicks attributed to individual users. android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER is used to set the home screen background wallpaper.android.permission.VIBRATE is used to vibrate the phone on successful completion of setting the wallpaper.android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is used to save images to the SD card. Images are automatically saved in a sub-folder of /wallpapers/ on your SD card named based on this app. They are only saved to the SD card when you set them as a wallpaper. This way, if you remove the app, you will retain the wallpapers on the SD card. You may delete the wallpapers from your SD card if you wish without affecting the functionality of the app.
